meanings.definition: To follow or chase after someone or something in order to catch or achieve them.
meanings.sent1: The detective was pursuing the suspect through the crowded streets.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys pursuing her dreams of becoming a professional dancer.
meanings.sent3: The cat was pursuing the elusive red dot, unaware of the laser pointer trick.
meanings.sent4: He was pursuing his passion for photography with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The athlete was pursuing the finish line with all his might, fueled by determination.

meanings.definition: To engage in an activity or course of action in order to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: They were pursuing a healthier lifestyle by eating more fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The students were pursuing higher grades by studying diligently for their exams.
meanings.sent3: She was pursuing the perfect cup of coffee, trying different brewing methods each day.
meanings.sent4: The team was pursuing victory with strategic plays and strong teamwork.
meanings.sent5: He was pursuing happiness by spending more time with loved ones and doing things he enjoyed.

meanings.definition: To continue or proceed with a course of action or activity.
meanings.sent1: Despite the challenges, she kept pursuing her passion for painting.
meanings.sent2: The company was pursuing new markets to expand its business globally.
meanings.sent3: The hiker was pursuing the summit, determined to reach the top before sunset.
meanings.sent4: He was pursuing his education, taking classes in the evenings after work.
meanings.sent5: The artist was pursuing perfection in every brushstroke, striving for excellence in her work.
